definition: chaotic warfare/confused fighting/melee/to join in such fighting
to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless

sentences.english: B A small rose-cut diamond or single-cut melee.
sentences.chinese: 二小玫瑰切割钻石或单减混战。

sentences.english: There is a football match on the playground.
sentences.chinese: 足球比赛时，运动员似在足球场上混战。

sentences.english: The movie’s main plot spends far more time on outer-space dogfights.
sentences.chinese: 影片花费了大量的时间在外太空混战上。

sentences.english: China did indeed slide into disarray, warlordism and insurrection after 1911.
sentences.chinese: 1911年后的中国确实陷入了军阀混战的乱局。

sentences.english: He might have been called the invulnerable dwarf of the fray.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，他是混战中的一个无懈可击的侏儒。

sentences.english: If you plan to include it will it be usable on melee maps or UMS only?
sentences.chinese: 您是计划让它是适用于混战地图或仅仅是UMS模式？

sentences.english: Hero, in a police bandit pursues in tangled warfare, had their absurd first meeting.
sentences.chinese: 痞子与英雄在一场警匪追逐的混战中，荒谬初会。

sentences.english: And two teachers scuffled over whether they could share one of the half-dozen tables in the room.
sentences.chinese: 而两外两名教师则为屋内一张桌子的使用权展开混战。

sentences.english: He was retaliating after his son was hurt in a scuffle.
sentences.chinese: 目的是为在混战中受伤的儿子报仇。

sentences.english: The police scuffled with the demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 警察和示威群众混战起来。

sentences.english: In a scuffle that ensued, Leia killed Lord Tion.
sentences.chinese: 随后便发生了一场混战，莱娅杀死了蒂翁勋爵。

sentences.english: Fat daughter comes to challenge, in a battle royal, miscarriage of white jade duckweed.
sentences.chinese: 胖闺女上门挑战，一场混战中，白玉萍小产了。

sentences.english: A scuffle broke out between Basijis and a group of young male demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: “巴斯基”民兵部队和一群年轻男性示威者发生混战。

sentences.english: How did this land of plenty descend into a perilous free-for-all?
sentences.chinese: 这么一大块土地是如何蜕变成一场危险的混战呢？

sentences.english: In the confusion, in order to save bonuses, Chen injured three guns.
sentences.chinese: 在一片混战之中，为了救下来花红，陈三炮重伤。

sentences.english: But the plan is plagued by bureaucratic in-fighting.
sentences.chinese: 只是这计划又苦于官僚之间的混战难以实施。

definition: lit. short-weaponed soldiery fight one another (idiom); fierce hand-to-hand infantry combat/to fight at close quarters
to besiege/to beleaguer/to attack from all sides/to jointly speak or write against sb
decisive battle/to fight a decisive battle/to fight for supremacy in ...
lit. you die, I live (idiom); irreconcilable adversaries/two parties cannot coexist
to start a war/to make war/to battle against
internal strife/power struggle/(of members of an organization) to fight each other
